name: An Dungeon
description:
A simple dungeon crawler in the style of a classic gameboy game. See how deep you can go and how many monsters you can kill.

___CONTROLS___

Arrow keys to move. Y - Move up left, U - Move up right, B - Move down left, N - Move down right. G - Pick up item. I - Inventory. D - Drop item. C - Character info. V - Message log. . - Wait in place. > (shift .) - Go down stairs.
